works.description:
**************************
REPEAT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE
**************************

Date of Notice: June 7, 2012 (UTC+09:00)
Sent by: AMUSE Inc.

Regarding:

<http://asiaticloverinbolivia.blogspot.com> (the "Blog")

To Whom It May Concern,

WE HAVE PREVIOUSLY NOTIFIED YOU OF INFRINGING MATERIALS ON THE SAME BLOG
MORE THAN ONCE:

<http://asiaticloverinbolivia.blogspot.com>

#1 - Notified on 2012-05-26 (UTC+09:00)
      See DMCA Notice [#1036497878]
      2 blog-posts

#2 - Notified on 2012-06-01 (UTC+09:00)
      See DMCA Notice [#1040532410]
      1 new blog-post

#3 - Notified on 2012-06-02 (UTC+09:00)
      See DMCA Notice [#1040532410] (reply)
      1 reappeared blog-post

#4 - Notified on 2012-06-02 (UTC+09:00)
      See DMCA Notice [#1036497878] (reply)
      2 reappeared blog-posts

#5 - Notified on 2012-06-05 (UTC+09:00)
      See DMCA Notice [#1043342845]
      1 new blog-post

and

#6 - This Notice


Despite the Notice(s), the Blog(s) continue to reupload and post,
without the relevant permissions, link(s) to file(s) the copyright in
which are owned by us. We are again asking for your immediate
assistance in stopping this unauthorized activity.

Given the Blog operaters' conduct in continuing the unauthorized
posting of link(s) to copyrighted work(s) on the Blog site(s), we
further request that Google removes the Blog(s) and terminates the
account of the operator(s) of the Blog(s) for REPEAT INFRINGEMENT in
accordance with its DMCA and Blogger's Terms of Service.


We hereby state that we have a good faith belief that use of the
material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agents, or the law.

The information in this Notice is accurate and we swear, under penalty
of perjury, that we are the copyright owner or are authorized to act
on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly
infringed.


COPYRIGHTED WORK(S) OR RIGHT(S)

Artist: Perfume
Title: Dream Fighter [c/w "Negai"][also from "Triangle"]
Catalog no.: TKCA-73395 / TKCA-73390, TKCA-73445 / TKCA-73440
JAN: 4988008995039 / 4988008994933, 4988008008647 / 4988008008548

Artist: Perfume
Title: Vitamin Drop [c/w "Inryoku"][also from "Perfume ~Complete Best~"]
Catalog no.: BEHV-0009; TKCA-73167 / TKCA-73086
JAN: 4943566270141; 4988008919639 / 4988008890037


REPEAT INFRINGER(S)
